participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, Sophie is eager to explore new opportunities while balancing her studies.
participant_1.background: My boss doesn't know that I'm an art student, but I'm hoping to show him my portfolio soon. My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK. Dancing is my passion. I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive. I get to show off my long fingernails.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Michael enjoys the dynamics of international business and is always eager to learn and grow.
participant_2.background: I am an international business man in my early 40s. I have an internship at a computer company. I graduated with a nursing degree. I'm currently looking for employment. My father used to be a cop.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing great! I am on my way to work.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I am an international business man.
That sounds very interesting! What is your favorite part of the job?
I love traveling and meeting new people.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Do you have any plans for your next trip?
I am not sure yet, but I am thinking about going to Europe.
That would be amazing! I have always wanted to go to Europe.
I have been to Europe a few times and I love it.
What is your favorite place that you have visited?
I would have to say that my favorite place was Paris.
Paris is beautiful! I have always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go! It is amazing.
I will definitely have to put it on my list of places to visit.
